title: Immigration made America great. I'm voting for immigration reform. I'm voting for Joe.
selftext:
My grandparents were immigrants. I am who I am because they worked hard to realize their dreams for our family in this country. I believe immigrants make our country great. I believe we should celebrate immigration as a central part of our culture. I believe our policies should match.

I know Joe Biden will reverse Trump era immigration policies - wall building, separating migrant families seeking asylum, reinstate DACA, and provide a roadmap to citizenship.  [https://joebiden.com/immigration/](https://joebiden.com/immigration/)
